meta.job_title: Environmental Justice, Equity and NEPA Specialist

duties_responsibilities.duty: Ensure effective implementation of NEPA and serve as a key NEPA specialist and project liaison.
Support the NEPA program by updating guidance, delivering training, and assisting in the development of new NEPA streamlining initiatives.
Act as a non-historic Section 4(f) and Section 6(f) specialist, providing guidance on evaluation processes.
Assist and guide the environmental justice and equity evaluation of projects in NEPA as needed.
Develop a standard operating procedure and annual training/exercise for the Environmental Justice and Equity program in NEPA.
Interpret environmental laws and regulations with regards to NEPA and determine project applicability.
Maintain NEPA Master Calendar, track NEPA document reviews, and route NEPA documents for final signatures.
Identify areas of CDOT’s NEPA program that could benefit from additional or updated policies, procedures, or guidance.
Provide project-level environmental and NEPA clearances.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Environmental Science or Studies, or closely related disciplines of Science or Engineering (Master's preferred)
